text: 4:13 Aposel 5:41; Rom 8:17; 2 Korin 1:7; 2 Timoti 2:12; Jems 1:2; 1 Pita 1:5-6; Akar Mogomem 1:9Ia osɨmtɨzir kabar aven Krais mɨzazim isi moghɨn, ia uaghan mɨzazim isi. Kamaghɨn ia bar akongegh. Egh gɨn a uamateghamin dughiamɨn ia an atrivimɨn angazangarimɨn ganɨva ian agorogem pɨn ikɨtɨ, ia guizbangɨra bar akuegham.
